      • InsertRow

        public void InsertRow(java.lang.String tableName,
                      java.lang.String term,
                      java.lang.String definition,
                      android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        This method inserts one row of data into a selected table in the database.
        Parameters:
        tableName - is the name of the selected table in the database.
        term - is the value to be put into the TERM column.
        definition - is the value to be put into the DEFINITION column.
        db - is the database in which the table is created.

      • DropTable

        public void DropTable(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                      java.lang.String tableName)
        This method deletes a selected table from the database.
        Parameters:
        db - is the database in which the table is created.
        tableName - is the name of the table to be deleted from the database.

      • DeleteRow

        public void DeleteRow(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                      java.lang.String tableName,
                      java.lang.String termName)
        This method deletes a selected row from a given table in the database.
        Parameters:
        db - is the database in which the table is created.
        tableName - is the name of the table from which one row is to be deleted.
        termName - is the value of the TERM column in the row to be deleted.
